mapper.insert: insert into p_order (quote_no, prod_code, opayment, polholder, insurant_a, insurant_b, premium, insdate, ins_from, ins_to, ptype, insloc, mobile, email, pbohumja_mobile, odate, jumin, user_id, o_by, owner, pbohumja_birth, advisor_no) values (#{quote_no}, #{prod_code}, #{opayment}, #{polholder}, #{insurant_a}, #{insurant_b}, #{premium}, #{insdate}, #{ins_from}, #{ins_to}, #{ptype}, #{insloc}, #{mobile}, #{email}, #{pbohumja_mobile}, sysdate, #{jumin}, #{user_id}, #{o_by}, #{owner}, #{pbohumja_birth}, #{advisor_no})
